blogPost.excerpt: Create your personal page and sell your services for Instagram and TikTok. Easily manage collaborations, receive messages from brands, and get paid directly to your bank account.
blogPost.body: Create your personal page and sell your services for Instagram and TikTok. Easily manage collaborations, receive messages from brands, and get paid directly to your bank account.
blogPost.title: Collabstr - A personal page to sell your Instagram & TikTok services
blogPost.author: Clayton Rannard

localize.description: 创建你的个人页面，并为Instagram和TikTok销售你的服务。轻松管理合作，接收来自品牌的消息，并直接从你的银行账户中获得报酬。
localize.tagline: 销售Instagram和TikTok服务的个人页面。

localize.description: 創建你的個人頁面，併爲Instagram和TikTok銷售你的服務。輕鬆管理合作，接收來自品牌的消息，並直接從你的銀行賬戶中獲得報酬。
localize.tagline: 銷售Instagram和TikTok服務的個人頁面。

previous.excerpt: Total.js Platform is a collection of libraries, packages, UI components, practices, and complete products written in pure JavaScript. Most of our libraries and UI components are without any 3rd party dependencies. Website: https://www.totaljs.com
previous.title: Total.js Platform - Open-source JavaScript platform

localize.description: Total.js平台是一个用纯JavaScript编写的库、包、UI组件、实践和完整产品的集合。我们的大部分库和UI组件都没有任何第三方的依赖。网站：https://www.totaljs.com
Total.js平臺是一個用純JavaScript編寫的庫、包、UI組件、實踐和完整產品的集合。我們的大部分庫和UI組件都沒有任何第三方的依賴。網站：https://www.totaljs.com

next.excerpt: Introducing the end of writer’s block. With CopyAI’s automated creativity tools, you can generate marketing copy in seconds.
next.title: copy.ai - Copywriting simplified

localize.description: 介绍结束作家的障碍。有了CopyAI的自动创意工具，你可以在几秒钟内生成营销文案。
介紹結束作家的障礙。有了CopyAI的自動創意工具，你可以在幾秒鐘內生成營銷文案。
